title: Kino no Tabi: The Beautiful World - Nanika wo Suru Tame ni - Life Goes On.
synopsis: After running away from the grim future that awaited her back in her home country, a young girl takes upon a new name and identity—inspired by the man who sacrificed his life to help her escape. Alongside her newfound companion, a talking motorcycle, the two find themselves a new home in the forest—where lives an elderly woman with an expertise in guns. Under the woman's care, the girl is trained in marksmanship and motorcycle handling among other various skills needed to survive.
staff: [['Watanabe, Takashi', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Shimokawa, Mikuni', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Maeda, Ai', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
